Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.network

Class ModelObservable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.network.ModelObservable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ModelObservable extends Object implements Serializable
This class contains methods used to notify the client about an update in the model.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getClients

      public ArrayList<javafx.util.Pair<VirtualView,String>> getClients()
      Returns the clients' virtual view and its ID
      Returns:
      for each client, pair virtualView - clientID

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver(VirtualView view, String clientID)
      Adds an observer to the observable.
      Parameters:
      view - client's view
      clientID - string client unique identifier

    • notifyUpdateGame

      public void notifyUpdateGame(SimplifiedGame simplifiedGame, String message)
      Notifies the client about an update in the model's game
      Parameters:
      simplifiedGame - simplified game containing only the information needed by the client
      message - information to show during the update

    • notifyUpdateGame

      public void notifyUpdateGame(SimplifiedGame simplifiedGame, Player currentPlayer)
      Notifies the client about an update in the model's game
      Parameters:
      simplifiedGame - simplified game containing only the information needed by the client
      currentPlayer - current player

      message - information to show during the update
      clientID - only receiver of update
